languages.text: "Тогда продолжим. Скрываясь за могуществом дарованного Империумом Патента, Теодора фон Валанциус не единожды позволяла себе откровенное сотрудничество с ксеносами". {n}Столь презрительной гримасы вы еще не видели на лице дознавателя.{/n} "Руками своих подданных, включая нынешнего Вольного Торговца, она повергала свой протекторат в ересь и отступничество, всеми силами мешая Инквизиции и мне лично поддерживать порядок внутри Простора".

traits.locale_text: "Тогда продолжим. Скрываясь за могуществом дарованного Империумом патента, Теодора фон Валанциус не единожды позволяла себе откровенное сотрудничество с этими..." {n}Столь презрительной гримасы вы еще не видели на лице дознавателя.{/n} "...Ксеносами. Руками Вольного Торговца повергала она свою торговую империю в ересь и отступничество, всеми силами мешая Инквизиции и мне лично поддерживать порядок внутри Коронуса".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Then let us continue. Shielded by the powers of the Warrant of Trade granted by the Imperium, Theodora von Valancius more than once allowed herself to openly collaborate with xenos." {n}You have never seen such a contemptuous grimace on the Interrogator's face.{/n} "She plunged her entire protectorate into apostasy and heresy, including the current Rogue Trader, and went out of her way to prevent the Inquisition and me personally from maintaining order inside the Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Тогда продолжим. Скрываясь за могуществом дарованного Империумом Патента, Теодора фон Валанциус не единожды позволяла себе откровенное сотрудничество с ксеносами". {n}Столь презрительной гримасы вы еще не видели на лице дознавателя.{/n} "Руками своих подданных, включая нынешнего Вольного Торговца, она повергала свой протекторат в ересь и отступничество, всеми силами мешая Инквизиции и мне лично поддерживать порядок внутри Простора".

traits.locale_text: "Then let us continue. Shielded by the powers of the Warrant of Trade granted by the Imperium, Theodora von Valancius more than once allowed herself to openly collaborate with the xenos." {n}You have never seen such a contemptuous grimace on the Interrogator's face.{/n} "She plunged her entire protectorate into apostasy and heresy, including the current Rogue Trader, and went out of her way to prevent the Inquisition and me personally from maintaining order inside the Expanse."

Shielded by the powers of the Warrant of Trade granted by the Imperium, Theodora von Valancius more than once allowed herself to openly collaborate with the xenos." {n}You have never seen such a contemptuous grimace on the Interrogator's face.{/n} "She plunged her entire protectorate into apostasy and heresy, including the current Rogue Trader, and went out of her way to prevent the Inquisition and me personally from maintaining order inside the Expanse."

Shielded by the powers of the Warrant of Trade granted by the Imperium, Theodora von Valancius more than once allowed herself to openly collaborate with xenos." {n}You have never seen such a contemptuous grimace on the Interrogator's face.{/n} "She plunged her entire protectorate into apostasy and heresy, including the current Rogue Trader, and went out of her way to prevent the Inquisition and me personally from maintaining order inside the Expanse."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then let us continue. Shielded by the powers of the Warrant of Trade granted by the Imperium, Theodora von Valancius more than once allowed herself to openly collaborate with xenos." {n}You have never seen such a contemptuous grimace on the Interrogator's face.{/n} "She plunged her entire protectorate into apostasy and heresy, including the current Rogue Trader, and went out of her way to prevent the Inquisition and me personally from maintaining order inside the Expanse."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Poursuivons. Protégée par les privilèges de la lettre de marque accordée par l'Imperium, Théodora von Valancius s'est à maintes reprises autorisée à collaborer ouvertement avec les xénos. » {n}Vous n'aviez encore jamais vu une telle expression de mépris sur le visage de l'interrogateur.{/n} « Elle a plongé son protectorat tout entier dans l'apostasie et l'hérésie, en entraînant avec elle l'{mf|actuel libre-marchand|actuelle libre-marchande}, et a tout fait pour empêcher l'Inquisition et moi-même de maintenir l'ordre dans les Étendues. »
languages.original_text: "Then let us continue. Shielded by the powers of the Warrant of Trade granted by the Imperium, Theodora von Valancius more than once allowed herself to openly collaborate with xenos." {n}You have never seen such a contemptuous grimace on the Interrogator's face.{/n} "She plunged her entire protectorate into apostasy and heresy, including the current Rogue Trader, and went out of her way to prevent the Inquisition and me personally from maintaining order inside the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Poursuivons. Protégée par les privilèges de la lettre de marque accordée par l'Imperium, Théodora von Valancius s'est à maintes reprises autorisée à collaborer ouvertement avec les xénos. » {n}Vous n'aviez encore jamais vu une telle expression de mépris sur le visage de l'interrogateur.{/n} « Elle a plongé son protectorat tout entier dans l'apostasie et l'hérésie, en entraînant avec elle l'{mf|actuel libre-marchand|actuelle libre-marchande}, et a tout fait pour empêcher l'Inquisition et moi-même de maintenir l'ordre dans les Étendues. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “既然如此，我们就继续吧。西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯将帝国的神圣贸易授状当做保护伞，不止一次地与异形公然合作。”{n}海因里希脸上露出了无比轻蔑的表情，你以前从没见过他露出这样的表情。{/n}“由于她的恶行，她的整个王朝都充斥着叛教者与异端分子，包括现任行商浪人本人在内。西奥多拉夫人不遗余力阻止审判庭与我本人维护科罗努斯扩区的秩序。”
languages.original_text: "Then let us continue. Shielded by the powers of the Warrant of Trade granted by the Imperium, Theodora von Valancius more than once allowed herself to openly collaborate with xenos." {n}You have never seen such a contemptuous grimace on the Interrogator's face.{/n} "She plunged her entire protectorate into apostasy and heresy, including the current Rogue Trader, and went out of her way to prevent the Inquisition and me personally from maintaining order inside the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，我们就继续吧。西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯将帝国的神圣贸易许可证当做保护伞，不止一次地与异形公然合作。”{n}海因里希脸上露出了无比轻蔑的表情，你以前从没见过他露出这样的表情。{/n}“由于她的恶行，她的整个王朝都充斥着叛教者与异端分子，包括现任行商浪人本人在内。西奥多拉夫人不遗余力阻止审判庭与我本人维护科罗努斯扩区的秩序。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「では続けよう。シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスが、帝国から与えられた通商許可証の効力を盾に、異種族と公然と協力していたことは一度や二度ではなかった」{n}インテロゲイターの顔にこれほど軽蔑的な笑みが浮かんだのをあなたは見たことがなかった。{/n}「彼女は現在の自由開拓者を含む自らの保護領全体を背教と異端に陥れ、異端審問庁と私個人がエクスパンス内の秩序を維持するのをわざわざ妨害した」
languages.original_text: "Then let us continue. Shielded by the powers of the Warrant of Trade granted by the Imperium, Theodora von Valancius more than once allowed herself to openly collaborate with xenos." {n}You have never seen such a contemptuous grimace on the Interrogator's face.{/n} "She plunged her entire protectorate into apostasy and heresy, including the current Rogue Trader, and went out of her way to prevent the Inquisition and me personally from maintaining order inside the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「では続けよう。シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスが、帝国から与えられた通商許可証の効力を盾に、異種族と公然と協力していたことは一度や二度ではなかった」{n}インテロゲイターの顔にこれほど軽蔑的な笑みが浮かんだのをあなたは見たことがなかった。{/n}「彼女は現在の自由開拓者を含む自らの保護領全体を背教と異端に陥れ、異端審問庁と私個人がエクスパンス内の秩序を維持するのをわざわざ妨害した」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Dann lasst uns weitermachen. Unter dem Schutz der vom Imperium verliehenen Handelsbriefs ließ sich Theodora von Valancius mehrfach dazu hin, offen mit den Xenos zusammenzuarbeiten." {n}Du hast noch nie erlebt, dass der Interrogator so verächtlich dreinschaut.{/n} "Sie löste in ihrem gesamten Protektorat Apostasie und Ketzerei aus, einschließlich {mf|beim jetzigen Freihändler|bei der jetzigen Freihändlerin}, und sie scheute keine Mühe, die Inquisition und mich persönlich davon abzuhalten, Ordnung in der Ausdehnung zu wahren."
languages.original_text: "Then let us continue. Shielded by the powers of the Warrant of Trade granted by the Imperium, Theodora von Valancius more than once allowed herself to openly collaborate with xenos." {n}You have never seen such a contemptuous grimace on the Interrogator's face.{/n} "She plunged her entire protectorate into apostasy and heresy, including the current Rogue Trader, and went out of her way to prevent the Inquisition and me personally from maintaining order inside the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Dann lasst uns weitermachen. Unter dem Schutz der vom Imperium verliehenen Handelsbriefs ließ sich Theodora von Valancius mehrfach dazu hin, offen mit den Xenos zusammenzuarbeiten." {n}Du hast noch nie erlebt, dass der Interrogator so verächtlich dreinschaut.{/n} "Sie löste in ihrem gesamten Protektorat Apostasie und Ketzerei aus, einschließlich {mf|beim jetzigen Freihändler|bei der jetzigen Freihändlerin}, und sie scheute keine Mühe, die Inquisition und mich persönlich davon abzuhalten, Ordnung in der Ausdehnung zu wahren."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Entonces prosigamos. Por la autoridad que le concedía la Patente de Comercio otorgada por el Imperium, Theodora von Valancius colaboró abiertamente y en más de una ocasión con los xenos». {n}Nunca habías visto una mueca de desdén tan pronunciada en el rostro del interrogador.{/n} «Sumió su protectorado entero en la apostasía y la herejía, {mf|incluido el|incluida la} actual Comerciante Independiente, y realizó indecibles esfuerzos para evitar que la Inquisición en general, y yo mismo en particular, impusiéramos el orden en los territorios de la Extensión».
languages.original_text: "Then let us continue. Shielded by the powers of the Warrant of Trade granted by the Imperium, Theodora von Valancius more than once allowed herself to openly collaborate with xenos." {n}You have never seen such a contemptuous grimace on the Interrogator's face.{/n} "She plunged her entire protectorate into apostasy and heresy, including the current Rogue Trader, and went out of her way to prevent the Inquisition and me personally from maintaining order inside the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces prosigamos. Por la autoridad que le concedía la Patente de Comercio otorgada por el Imperium, Theodora von Valancius colaboró abiertamente y en más de una ocasión con los xenos». {n}Nunca habías visto una mueca de desdén tan pronunciada en el rostro del interrogador.{/n} «Sumió su protectorado entero en la apostasía y la herejía, {mf|incluido el|incluida la} actual Comerciante Independiente, y realizó indecibles esfuerzos para evitar que la Inquisición en general, y yo mismo en particular, impusiéramos el orden en los territorios de la Extensión».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "O hâlde devam edelim. İmparatorluk tarafından tahsis edilen Ticari Ruhsatname'nin gücüyle korunan Theodora von Valancius, birden çok kez alenen zenolarla iş birliği yapmıştır." {n}Sorgucu'nun yüzünü bu denli hor gören bir şekilde buruşturduğunu ilk kez görüyorsun.{/n} "Mevcut Hür Tacir de dâhil tüm protektorasını din düşmanlığına ve kâfirliğe sürüklemiştir. Dahası, Engizisyon'un ve şahsımın Enginlik içerisinde düzeni sağlama çabalarımızı engellemek için de yoğun çaba sarf etmiştir."
languages.original_text: "Then let us continue. Shielded by the powers of the Warrant of Trade granted by the Imperium, Theodora von Valancius more than once allowed herself to openly collaborate with xenos." {n}You have never seen such a contemptuous grimace on the Interrogator's face.{/n} "She plunged her entire protectorate into apostasy and heresy, including the current Rogue Trader, and went out of her way to prevent the Inquisition and me personally from maintaining order inside the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde devam edelim. İmparatorluk tarafından tahsis edilen Ticaret Ruhsatnamesi'nin gücü tarafından korunan Theodora von Valancius, birden fazla kez açık bir şekilde zenolarla iş birliği içine girmiştir." {n}Sorgucu'nun yüzünü bu denli hor gören bir şekilde buruşturduğunu daha önce görmemiştin.{/n} "Tüm protektorasını din düşmanlığına ve kâfirliğe sürüklemiştir, ki buna mevcut Hür Tacir de dâhil. Hatta kendisi, Engizisyon'un ve şahsımın Enginlik içerisinde düzeni sağlama çabalarımızı engellemek için de yoğun çaba sarf etmiştir."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
